title.narrative: Programa de Mejoramiento y Rehabilitacion Vial

description.narrative: Mejorar la movilidad y la seguridad urbana y suburbana, así como la accesibilidad de una importante zona agropecuaria, disminuir los costos de transporte y reducir las tasas de accidentes por medio de la rehabilitación y el mejoramiento de las carreteras East Canje y West Canje, la red de arterias urbanas de Georgetown, la Carretera de acceso al aeropuerto desde la carretera de la Ribera Oriental (East Bank Road) e intervenciones localizadas en este última carretera de acceso al aeropuerto Cricket y Diamond/Grove.

To enhance urban and suburban mobility and safety, improve accessibility to an important agricultural zone, lower transport costs and reduce accident rates, through the rehabilitation and improvement of the East and West Canje Roads, the urban arterial network in Georgetown, the access road to the airport from the East Bank Road (EBR), and localized interventions on the EBR between the Cricket Stadium and Diamond / Grove

activity-description.narrative: 19 km of roadway was improved and rehabilitated to improve road reliability and driving conditions in in East and West Canje. Road works included rehabilitation of roads, replacement of bridges and culverts, construction of sidewalks, improvements of urban crossings and roadside amenities to enhance safety and socioeconomic benefits.

Periodic Maintenance was carried out on the four (4) km of access road to Guyana's international airport at Timehri with an asphaltic concrete overlay to improve the driving comfort as well as roadside amenities were improved at key locations to enhance safety. 0

Periodic Maintenance was carried out on the four (4) km of access road to Guyana's international airport at Timehri with an asphaltic concrete overlay to improve the driving comfort as well as roadside amenities were improved at key locations to enhance safety. 1

Rehabilitation and improvement of the East and West Canje Road. The project enhances Guyana's urban and suburban mobility and safety. It improves access to an important agricultural zone, lowers transport costs and reduces accident rates.
Supervision services at the East and West Canje Road.
The road and structures in East Canje was rehabilitated as part of the project. With improved roads, residents now have access to agricultural zones and reduce transport costs and accident rates.
The rehabilitation of the roads and structures in West Canje was financed by the project to improve access to an important agricultural zone, lower transport cost and to reduce accident rates.

The upgrade of the access road and the improvement of its roadside amenities to Guyana's only international airport has enhanced the mobility, safety, road reliability and driving conditions along the roadway.
